alert.note: Alert for Highland; Pike; Ross (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:50AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN PIKE, EASTERN HIGHLAND AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 815 AM EST... At 749 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located over Marshall, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Hillsboro, Greenfield, Marshall, Bainbridge, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Rocky Fork Point, Highland Holiday, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, Frankfort, South Salem, Sinking Spring, Austin, Knockemstiff, Massieville, Rocky Fork Lake and Bourneville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
